mdRecord.dcterms:title: Personal Appearance by Lawrence Riley
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the July 30- Aug 1 production of Lawrence Riley's Personal Appearance at Stonewall Auditorium in Abingdon, Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
